Subject: “Action to_be taken in case of failure in detection of dummy
check: Reg”

There have been instances wherein on duty ASG personnel were not able to
detect the dummy/decoy checks conducted by BCAS, Airport Sector Hars, or
concerned DisG.

On perusal of the action taken report received in this Hars, it is seen that
CASOs/Unit Commanders do not take a judicious approach in making the
responsible personnel realize their mistake and improve thereafter. More often than
not CASOs/Unit Commanders find an easy way out by taking disciplinary action U/R-
37 of CISF rules 2001.

A graded response is required to be undertaken in these cases so that these
checks lead to a desired improvement in screening and frisking. Taking into
consideration the gravity of lapse committed and the general performance of the
individual, it is suggested that the following gradual response be adopted in dealing
with such lapses/failures :-
